runs.comm: lovely length wide of off, a bit of swing away and excellent carry as well, beats Hafeez's edge as he comes forward for an angled-bat drive
back of a length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
bouncer, Hafeez ducks under it
length ball on off stump, defended into the covers, extra bounce there, hit the sticker of Hafeez's bat as he came half-forward
digs this in shorter, angling into off stump, Hafeez gets on his toes and defends
beauty. Gets this to jag away off the pitch in the corridor, from back of a length, and Hafeez is beaten, pushing his hands at the ball
starts off with a wide, full and swinging down the leg side
fullish on off stump, Shehzad pokes to mid-off and sets off for a single, Hafeez sends him back
slants this full and wide outside off, left alone. Batsman may have been thinking it would be called wide, but it wasn't
back of a length, leg stump, tucked away into the leg side
full on off stump, punched back to the bowler
short, just enough width for Hafeez, who sits on the back foot, waits, and opens his bat face just a touch to place that to the right of the diving backward point fielder
yikes. Completely lost control of that one. Length ball, slung a long way outside off, no way Shehzad could have put bat to that
length ball on off stump, tucked into the leg side, looking for a single, but the fielder at midwicket closes down quickly
short on off stump, pulled to square leg
back of a length outside off, makes a bit of room and dabs to backward point
full, angling into the stumps, driven to mid-on, cleared his front leg and whipped it with his wrists
length ball angling into the batsman, and he clears his front leg once more, opens out to swipe that over midwicket
fullish on off stump, tries to make room but doesn't get too much of it, jabs to short extra cover
short on middle stump, pulled to deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, lets it come on and dabs to third man
length ball angling across, and Hafeez premeditates a lap-scoop and pulls it off, moves across his stumps and middles it, picks the gap to the left of short fine leg
and another. Down the track now, makes a bit of room to get swinging room against the slower ball and lift it over the covers
full on off stump, lets it come on and squeezes it to third man with an open face
shortish on middle and leg, not quite there for the pull and it sneaks under his bat and hits him on the hip
in the blockhole on off stump, excellent start, Shehzad can only jab it back to the bowler
short outside off, and that's pummelled, opens up a touch, gets on top of the bounce, and pulls it through wide mid-on
clears his front leg again and this time it's a length ball from Milne, on off stump. Shehzad just clubs it away, up and over mid-on and it clears the short straight boundary easily

length ball, a bit wider outside off now, and Shehzad attempts the same shot he pulled off the previous ball, ends up picking out Elliott coming in off the rope at long-on. The line made him hit it straighter than he would have liked
back of a length outside off, opens his bat face to guide to third man
full on off and middle, driven to short cover
full outside off stump, and that's lovely from Hafeez, gets forward but stays inside the line of it, uses the angle to drive to the right of the diving cover point fielder
short, some width again, and Hafeez slaps it away, in the air but just clears the leaping Astle at cover point
much fuller this time, and quicker, and Hafeez, looking to slash through point, can only drag it back to the bowler
fullish outside off, right in the slot for Hafeez to hit over the top, just extended his arms through it, keeping his front leg well away from the line, and lofted it over mid-off
good comeback, angles this into the corridor and rolls his fingers over. Hafeez is beaten by the lack of pace as he looks to guide this down to third man
shot. length ball, a little too much width, and Hafeez capitalises, takes a step deep into his crease and slashes it away to the left of backward point

strikes first ball! Maqsood gave away his intentions too early, jumped down the pitch and Santner fired it in quicker and a touch shorter, beyond the batsman's reach. He swings across the line, and it turns away sharply, takes his outside edge, and the keeper completes a good catch and pulls off a stumping as well
length ball angling into middle stump, stays back and defends back to the bowler
flat, angling into leg stump. A bit of turn, forces Malik to force it back to the bowler rather than work into the leg side
short outside off, chopped away to sweeper cover
a bit of flight, drops onto a good length and spins away from middle and off. Hafeez dabs to backward point
back of a length on off stump, makes a bit of room and pushes into the gap at cover point
flat outside leg stump, a bit of turn into the pads, tucked quietly into the leg side
length ball on middle stump, pushed down the ground to long-on
slider on middle stump, goes back and makes room to play through the off side, can only jab to cover
quicker ball on middle stump, makes room and dabs into the point region
a touch short, it's the googly, and he has midwicket back on the rope to stop that pull
tossed up on off stump, driven to extra cover
flat, angling into leg stump, not short enough for the pull and he bottom-edges towards short fine leg
shortish on off stump, pulled away through straight midwicket
short outside off, slapped to deep point
a bit of flight on leg stump, looks to work it leg side and it dips and turns and pops off the leading edge into the covers
down the track comes Malik, and that is a monster hit, gets under this flighted ball outside off and frees his arms, finishes with bat over left shoulder and sends the ball soaring over long-on
flatter and shorter, pressure telling on the leggie, gives a bit of width and Malik chops it away to the square third man boundary
shortish outside off, jabbed to deep point
length ball on middle stump, worked away through backward square leg
down the track to the slowish legbreak on off stump, doesn't reach the pitch and pokes it into the cover point region
flat, angling into middle and leg, goes on the back foot and nudges into the leg side
flat, back of a length on off stump, can't make enough room to force it past short extra cover diving to his left
ooh, nearly bowls him. Slows it down on a shortish length, and Malik is through his pull too early, inside-edges onto the keeper's right foot

down the track and he doesn't reach the pitch this time, spins away and Malik, who wants to hit this over mid-on or over the bowler, ends up slicing it a bit and it drops down gently into long-off's hands
quickish length ball on leg stump, tucked quietly into the on side
back of a length, angling into middle and leg, goes deep in his crease and tucks it through square leg
tossed up outside off, comes forward to squeeze the drive towards point
tossed up on off stump and Hafeez is quickly down on one knee, opens his front leg out, and slog-sweeps over midwicket
flighted ball outside off, gets forward and dabs into the covers
shortish, a bit of width, leans back and dabs to the left of the sweeper cover fielder
back of a length on off stump, spins away and Akmal rocks back to punch through point
short and flat outside off, opens out and swats it down to long-on
back of a length, angling into the batsman's legs, tucked away through mid-on to bring up his half-century off 36 balls
back of a length outside off, some turn away, uses the bottom wrist well to whip it to long-on
quicker now, on middle and leg, tucks it into the mid-on region but the bowler is quick to move across and cut off the single
back of a length, sliding on towards off stump, goes back and jabs to point
back of a length, gets some turn on this occasion, from leg to off, and Hafeez makes a bit of room to poke that through cover point
fuller and quicker on the pads, nudged into the square leg region
back of a length on off stump, Akmal dabs it to the left of the short cover fielder
back of a length, angling into off stump, tucked away to midwicket
bouncer, achieves steep bounce while cramping the batsman for room. Looks to back away for the uppercut but it's too quick and beats his bat
full, too much width, and Hafeez times this wonderfully, gets down low, on his back knee, and uses his wrists to lift that over extra cover
short, angling into the body, pulled to deep square leg
short on off stump, Akmal opens up at the hips and uses the angle well to pull it to the left of the man at deep square leg, who runs across to field, gets to the ball, and fumbles it over the rope
back of a length outside off, punched firmly and straight to point
short, angling into middle stump, pulled to the right of the deep midwicket fielder
length ball on off stump, opens up and punches to deep midwicket
short outside off and what a shot from Hafeez. Bounced steeply, and he still managed to get on top of the bounce and use his wrists to play a topspin forehand pull to the wide long-on boundary

short again, angling into the body this time, and Hafeez hits picks out the square leg fielder with his pull. Seemed like a slightly slower delivery than the previous ones. Superb effort from Astle, diving to his right to take it over his shoulder
back of a length outside off, dabbed away to third man
starts with a bouncer, quick and angling into the batsman, who ducks under it. Called wide, and it's harsh, I'm not sure it would have been over head height had he been standing to his full height
bam, what a hit. It was short and angling into Afridi, and he just whipped it away, took it at chest height and just whipped it over the backward square leg boundary
full and wide, and that is slapped. Gets down low and gets it over the cover fielder, goes to the boundary like a rocket
full-toss on off stump, and Afridi dispatches another one to the cover boundary, just clears his front leg and flat-bats over cover
full and wide, and Afridi gets down on one knee and flays his arms at the ball, slices it high over backward point, and has that carried all the way? It has, just.
slower ball, out of the back of the hand, shortish and close to off stump, has to wait a long time before he can pull it through wide mid-on
back of a length and quick, fifth-stump line, punched away through mid-off

length ball, a bit of width, and Williamson drops it, running back from mid-off after Akmal backs away and flat-bats. The ball hits high on the bat and he skews it high in the air. Difficult catch, running back and to his left
shortish, angling into middle stump, and Akmal smacks that over long-on. Just clears his front leg and swivels through his hips

slower ball this time, a little short again, waits on the back foot and pulls it round through square leg. In the air, but it drops down to york the square leg fielder diving to his right, slips past him
yorker on off stump and Akmal makes room to jab it away to the right of third man
full outside off, too full to properly get under it, and Akmal goes hard at it, skews it in the air as his bat turns in his hand. and picks out the fielder at deep cover
sees Afridi coming out of his crease and drops a slower one a little shorter outside off. Afridi lets it come on and slaps it to deep cover
full on off stump and Afridi can't get elevation. Opens up a bit to try and lift it over the cover fielder, but he ends up hitting it straight to him instead
yorker on leg stump. Imad clears his front leg and swipes to long-on
low full-toss on off stump, jabbed past the diving bowler towards long-off
full-toss angling into the body, and Imad puts it away so coolly, reverse-lapping it to the right of the short third man fielder

slower ball, full on off stump, flat-batted hard but straight to mid-off. The throw to the bowler's end misses, and they sneak an overthrow even as the keeper runs around to back up and flick to the non-striker's end
short angling into the body, only gets up to waist height and Imad opens up at the hips to just whip it over the backward square leg boundary
short slower ball on off stump, pulled towards deep midwicket
short ball angling away from the left-hander, who swivels through a pull and fails to connect

in the blockhole on off stump, and that's very well played, makes a bit of room to force the ball past the diving cover fielder, and Astle does well to run around from deep point and stop it on the slide
length ball on off stump, makes a bit of room and flat-bats to the left of the deep point fielder
slower length ball on off stump, backs away to slap to mid-off, who's right on the edge of the 30-yard circle

full on leg stump, follows Sarfraz looking to make himself room. It was the back-of-the-hand slower ball, and Sarfraz skews his attempted big hit down the ground, doesn't time it well at all, and Williamson runs to his right from mid-off and takes a good tumbling catch
length ball angling down leg, Wahab swings and misses, and Imad calls early to sneak a bye. The keeper's rolled throw misses the stumps at the batsman's end
good short ball on middle stump, and Imad, moving away from his leg stump, is not in a stable position while trying to pull, and ends up slicing it to the cover fielder
good slower bouncer over off stump. Wahab slogs and misses
slower ball, full outside off, drags this flat-bat drive down to long-off
slower length ball outside off, chopped to short third man
short ball on off stump, pulled to deep midwicket
